transcript.message: Hello! Thank you for calling. How can I help you today?
Hi, I'd like to check on my order XYZ-789
Of course! Let me look that up for you. I see your order XYZ-789 was shipped yesterday and should arrive by Friday.
Great, thank you! Can you send it via express shipping instead?
Absolutely! I've upgraded your shipping to express. You should receive it by tomorrow.
